copyright: The data included in this document is from www.openstreetmap.org. The data is made available under ODbL.

@id.description: name that identifies a unique object

public_transport.description: name that denotes stop positions and platforms of public transport

name.description: name that identifies the name of the bus-stop

shelter.description: identifies the presence or absence of the shelter

bus.description: Access values describe restrictions or not of the bus in the bus-stop

bench.description: identifies the presence or absence of the shelter

alt_name:lld.description: another unofficial but locals feequntly name in local dialects

departures_board.description: name that identifies the type of time table or departures present in the bus stop

operator:old_name.description: name that identifies company who is in charge of the service at the bus stop

route_ref.description: name that identifies a list of all bus lines that serve the stop

bus_routes.description: name that identifies a list of Flixbus that serve the stop

created_by.description: name that identifies the computer program (editor or script) which made the changes

wheelchair.description: identifies if the bus stop is suitable to be used with a wheelchair and a person with a disability who uses another mobility device (like a walker)

note:tactile_paving.description: identifies if there is Tactile paving

covered:source.description: identifies how the information was collected

ref.description: name that identifies a list of all bus lines that serve the stop

name:de.description: German name of the bus stop

addr:city.description: name identifying the name of the city where the bus stop is located

addr:postcode.description: number identifying the postcode of the city where the bus stop is located

addr:street.description: name identifying the name of the street where the bus stop is located

alt_name.description: alternative name of the bus stop

amenity.description: Describes useful and important facilities for visitors and residents

bin.description: identifies presence or absence of a waste basket

network.description: name that identifies company who is in charge of the service at the bus stop

toilets:wheelchair.description: identifies if in the bus stop there is a toilets for people with disabilates

designation.description: The tag is used to record the legal classification of an object.

local_ref.description: indicate the number or letter of the stop, platform or other transport feature

mapillary.description: key describes a reference code to an image in Mapillary

official_name.description: Identifies official name of the bus stop

website.description: identifies the website related to the bus stop

fixme.description: Used to mark objects and places that need further attention

passenger_information_display.description: indicates the presecne of real-time passenger information

coordinates.description: array the points which compose the polygon
